detail_desc: Fine-knit trainer socks in fast-drying functional fabric.
Fleece gloves with ribbing containing glittery threads at the cuffs. Unlined.
Fleece gloves with ribbing containing glittery threads at the cuffs. Unlined.
Wide T-shirt in striped jersey made from a cotton blend with gently dropped shoulders and a rounded hem.
Wide T-shirt in striped jersey made from a cotton blend with gently dropped shoulders and a rounded hem.
Short shorts in cotton twill with an elasticated, smocked waist, pleats at the top and diagonal front pockets.
Calf-length, pleated skirt in woven fabric with a sheen. Elasticated waist. Unlined.
Double-layered tube scarf in soft, fine-knit wool. Width 26 cm, circumference 54 cm.
Double-layered tube scarf in soft, fine-knit wool. Width 26 cm, circumference 54 cm.
5-pocket shorts in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and straight legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Tailored, high-waisted shorts in woven fabric. Concealed elastication at the waist and a concealed zip and two pairs of hook-and-eye fasteners at one side. Side pockets with decorative metal studs, fake welt back pockets and short slits in the sides.

Ankle-length trousers in Tencel™ lyocell twill with a high paper bag waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt. Zip fly, concealed hook-and-eye fastening, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and wide, tapered legs.
Shorts in a checked weave with an extended waistband, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Welt side pockets, fake back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Metal earrings with sparkly stones. Length 3.5 cm.
Off-the-shoulder playsuit in airy viscose jersey with wide elastication at the top, an elasticated seam at the waist and short, wide sleeves.
Jumper in a soft knit with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Blouse in woven fabric with concealed buttons down the front and a collar with detachable ties. Yoke with a pleat at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft, patterned, organic cotton jersey with a collar and chest pocket . Press-studs down the front and along one leg, short sleeves and short legs.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft, patterned, organic cotton jersey with a collar and chest pocket . Press-studs down the front and along one leg, short sleeves and short legs.
Dress in a viscose crêpe weave with a V-neck, smocked seam under the bust and long sleeves with smocked cuffs. Unlined.
Dress in a viscose crêpe weave with a V-neck, smocked seam under the bust and long sleeves with smocked cuffs. Unlined.
Thin, padded jacket with press-studs down the front and concealed side pockets. Lined.
Thin, padded jacket with press-studs down the front and concealed side pockets. Lined.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a small stand-up collar. Gathered yoke front and back, concealed buttons down the front and long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs and ties.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a small stand-up collar. Gathered yoke front and back, concealed buttons down the front and long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs and ties.

Short dress in an airy, patterned weave with an opening at the top, a small, frilled collar and an elasticated neckline with ties and tassels at the front. Long raglan sleeves with elasticated cuffs and a narrow elasticated seam under the bust. Partly lined.
Shaping. 5-pocket jeans in washed denim with technical stretch that holds in and shapes the tummy, thighs and seat while keeping the jeans in shape. High waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs.
Shaping. 5-pocket jeans in washed denim with technical stretch that holds in and shapes the tummy, thighs and seat while keeping the jeans in shape. High waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs.
Shaping. 5-pocket jeans in washed denim with technical stretch that holds in and shapes the tummy, thighs and seat while keeping the jeans in shape. High waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs.

Short dress in a patterned jacquard weave with short sleeves and decorative gathers at the shoulders and back. Opening with a button at the back of the neck, elasticated seam under the bust and a detachable tie belt with plastic D-rings. Pockets in the side seams. Unlined.
Suede court shoes with pointed toes, leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 5.5 cm.
Suede court shoes with pointed toes, leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 5.5 cm.

Short shorts in a soft weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Partially concealed fabric belt with a metal square ring buckle at the front, side pockets, welt back pockets and short slits in the sides.

Short shorts in a soft weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Partially concealed fabric belt with a metal square ring buckle at the front, side pockets, welt back pockets and short slits in the sides.

Knee-length shorts in woven fabric containing some wool with a paper bag waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Detachable tie belt with a metal buckle, slightly lower crotch, side pockets and welt back pockets with a button.
Trousers in a checked weave with a regular, elasticated waist, fake fly, side pockets, welt back pockets and tapered legs.
Blouse in a viscose weave with a collar and V-neck with a pleat at the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a detachable tie belt at the waist.

T-shirt in hard-washed slub jersey made from a cotton and viscose blend with decorative seams front and back. Slightly longer at the back.
Pull-on trousers in cotton corduroy with elasticated ribbing at the waist and hems. Fake fly, side pockets and one back pocket. Jersey lining.
